title: GT 4.0 C Common Libraries : User's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The C Common Libraries provide an abstraction layer for data types, libc system calls, and data structures used throughout the Globus Toolkit and useful for applications that use the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Troubleshooting
section.para: The C common libraries are intended for use by developers; there are no user level troubleshooting techniques.
